section1.title: Shipping
section1.content1: We ask our customers to allow us 3-5 business days of processing time to assemble your order before it ships. Please note that tracking is not available for In-Person Pick Up orders, instead you will receive an email to arrange a pickup.
section1.content2: To calculate your estimated delivery time, please add the estimated processing time to the delivery estimate of the shipping method youâ€™ve chosen.
section1.content3: Tracking will be sent via email and can be tracked on the website of the postal service used for your order.
section1.content4: We offer complimentary shipping on all orders over $99 CAD*
section1.footnote: *Please note, orders must have a subtotal of $99 CAD or more before taxes, fees and discounts to be eligible for free shipping. Additional restrictions may apply.
section1.content5: We are only shipping orders within Canada at this time. International shipping will be available very shortly, please join our newsletter below to stay up to date.
